Disperses Wind-Cold-Dampness, opens the channels, vitalizes the vessels and alleviates pain.
With Fang Feng, for numbness in the legs.
With Qiang Huo for joint pain and numbness.

Expels Wind-Cold-Dampness and alleviates pain.

Soreness, aching and fixed pain of joints
